content.p: Our research expertise spans a wide range of areas with most of our academic staff internationally recognised in their fields. Much of our work is interdisciplinary and our research environment is supportive and encourages open dialogue. Our areas of interest and who's involved Explore some of our research projects Centres of collaboration and communication Exploring the latest issues Join our research team Our research has a 100% rating for international quality Our department boasts world-leading, multidisciplinary expertise. My own research on contemporary religious media has pioneered new empirical and theoretical approaches to some of the most significant frontiers in religious thought and practice: online worship, digital sacred texts, grief online, digital journalism and more.
